episodes.title: Stephen Hargrave Addressing racist White Supremacist in the COGR as the reason he demanded money
episodes.description: Around two years after visiting Mexico, the COGR leader Stephen Hargrave of Muncie, Indiana, calls a special meeting to debunk any other thoughts concerning his trip to Mexico. In this video he claims the reason his white leader, D. Ray Tinsman, sent him, was because he is black and their people in Mexico are white. Stephen Claims the people of their Mexico congregation are racist and were ill appropriating their money. In this video Stephen Hargrave appears to be blaming the people of his organization for his manners toward them. It appears to us at Cultbusters that Stephen is attempting damage control for his own words and actions and thus fulfilling the scripture which says, "the leaders of the people cause them to err."

episodes.description:
In this live breakdown Adam uncovers the underlying heresy of the COGR leaders Gary boevers and his helper from Austria. The full message of the COGR cult leaders follows. Take note of how a mortal man (Ray) is elevated far above every other man worldwide. 
“Now we beseech you, brethren, by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and by our gathering together unto him, That ye be not soon shaken in mind, or be troubled, neither by spirit, nor by word, nor by letter as from us, as that the day of Christ is at hand. Let no man deceive you by any means: for that day shall not come, except there come a falling away first, and that man of sin be revealed, the son of perdition; Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God, or that is worshipped; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God, shewing himself that he is God.
For the mystery of iniquity doth already work: only he who now letteth will let, until he be taken out of the way. And then shall that Wicked be revealed, whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth, and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming: Even him, whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders, And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish; because they received not the love of the truth, that they might be saved. And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion, that they should believe a lie: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth, but had pleasure in unrighteousness.”
‭‭2 Thessalonians‬ ‭2:1-4, 7-12‬ ‭KJV‬‬
